MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in West Foulshields Farm and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have Arrived onsite and confirmed a grounded overhead cable at West Foulshields farm. We require additional resources to help with the repair and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:11PM on Thursday 15 April 2021.
